facts.text: The Los Angeles Galaxy began play in Major League Soccer as one of the league's ten charter members in 1996.
The Los Angeles Galaxy has won a record six MLS Cups as of 2024.
The Galaxy won their record-extending sixth MLS Cup and broke the record for most goals during a playoff campaign with 18 goals in 2024.
David Beckham's signing in 2007 from Real Madrid was considered the most high-profile transaction with MLS to that point.
Landon Donovan is the all-time leading scorer for the Los Angeles Galaxy.
The Los Angeles Galaxy is one of three American clubs to have won the CONCACAF Champions' Cup, achieving this in 2000.
The Galaxy finished as runners-up in the first MLS Cup final to D.C. United in 1996.
In 2001, the Los Angeles Galaxy won the Open Cup and scored their 1,000th all-time point.
The team's original home games were played at the Rose Bowl in Pasadena, California, before moving to Dignity Health Sports Park in Carson, California in 2003.
The Los Angeles Galaxy was founded in 1994 and is owned by Anschutz Entertainment Group.
In what year did the LA Galaxy win their first MLS Cup?
How many times had the LA Galaxy appeared in the MLS Cup before winning their first championship in 2002?
Four
Against which team did the LA Galaxy win their first MLS Cup in 2002?
What was the score when the LA Galaxy won their first MLS Cup in 2002?
In which year did the LA Galaxy acquire Landon Donovan from San Jose?
How many times had the LA Galaxy appeared in the playoffs in the league's first ten seasons?
Every season
Who did the LA Galaxy defeat to win the 2005 MLS Cup?
What was the cause of death for Doug Hamilton, the LA Galaxy's general manager, in 2006?
Heart attack
Who replaced Steve Sampson as head coach of the LA Galaxy in 2006?
Frank Yallop
In what year did the LA Galaxy sign David Beckham from Real Madrid?
How much was Herbalife's sponsorship deal with the LA Galaxy worth annually?
Between $4–5 million
Who replaced Ruud Gullit as the LA Galaxy's head coach?
In what year did the LA Galaxy go on a promotional tour of Australia and New Zealand, setting attendance records?
How many people attended the match between Sydney FC and LA Galaxy at Stadium Australia?
In what year did Bruce Arena fail to lead the LA Galaxy into a playoff spot, marking the third-straight season without playoff contention?
In what year did the LA Galaxy introduce top signings Joseph Paintsil and Gabriel Pec, while letting Douglas Costa and Chicharito leave the club?
How many MLS Cups had the LA Galaxy won by the end of 2024?
Six
What was the LA Galaxy's goal total during the MLS playoffs when they set the record for most goals in playoffs history?
In what year did the LA Galaxy first turn a profit, becoming the first MLS team to do so?
What colors were adopted for the LA Galaxy's team colors to coincide with David Beckham's arrival in 2007?
Navy blue, gold, and white
How many logos has the LA Galaxy had to date?
Two
According to a Forbes 2015 report, where did the LA Galaxy rank in MLS in terms of annual revenue?
Second
What was the LA Galaxy's annual local TV rights income, the highest among MLS teams according to the report?
$5 million
Landon Donovan became the MLS all-time goal king on May 25, 2014.
Atlanta United was named Major League Soccer's most valuable team in 2019.
Los Angeles Galaxy won the 2002 MLS Cup with a 1–0 double overtime win against New England Revolution.
Doug Hamilton, Galaxy GM and president, died on a flight home on March 9, 2006.
Los Angeles Galaxy fired coach Sampson on June 6, 2006.
Los Angeles Galaxy signed a sponsorship deal with Herbalife on January 10, 2008.
David Beckham made his debut for LA Galaxy in 2007.
Los Angeles Galaxy appointed Ruud Gullit as coach in 2007.
Los Angeles Galaxy won against Sydney FC in a third-place match in 2008.
Ruud Gullit resigned as coach of Los Angeles Galaxy, and president/GM Alexi Lalas was out in 2008.
David Beckham expressed his desire to stay with AC Milan over returning to LA Galaxy in February 2009.
Real Salt Lake defeated Los Angeles Galaxy for the MLS championship on November 23, 2009.
David Beckham played what was suggested to be his final game in MLS in 2011, helping the Galaxy to win the championship.
Which team won the MLS Cup in 1998? Chicago Fire FC
Which team was the MLS Supporters' Shield winner in 2014? Seattle Sounders FC
Who won the MLS Cup in 2023? Columbus Crew
In what year did the Seattle Sounders FC win their first MLS Supporters' Shield? 2014
Which team won the CONCACAF Champions League in 2022? Seattle Sounders FC
Who was the CONCACAF Champions League winner in 2021? Monterrey
Which team won the MLS Cup for the first time in 2010? Colorado Rapids
What team won the CONCACAF Champions League in 2019? Monterrey
Who won the MLS Supporters' Shield in 2023? FC Cincinnati
In 2024, which team won the MLS Supporters' Shield? Inter Miami CF
Which kit manufacturer was the first to sponsor LA Galaxy's kits from 1996 to 2002?
Nike
Who was LA Galaxy's shirt sponsor from 2007 to 2020?
Herbalife
In which year did LA Galaxy change their shirt sponsor to "Honey"?
What is the name of the venue where LA Galaxy has played their home matches since 2003?
Dignity Health Sports Park
David Beckham played for LA Galaxy during which years?
Who is the captain of LA Galaxy as listed in the player roster?
Maya Yoshida
Which player is on loan to LA Galaxy from Botafogo as of the latest update?
Matheus Nascimento
Who is the head coach of LA Galaxy according to the latest staff listing?
Greg Vanney
LA Galaxy's shirt sponsor changed to which company in 2025?
RBC
Which player was on loan to Nashville SC from LA Galaxy?
Jonathan Pérez
